thread.title: NLIGHT Introduces 1 kW Fiber Laser at Metalworking and CNC Machine Tool Show 2015
thread.title_full: NLIGHT Introduces 1 kW Fiber Laser at Metalworking and CNC Machine Tool Show 2015 - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: NLIGHT Introduces 1 kW Fiber Laser at Metalworking and CNC Machine Tool Show 2015
text:
nLIGHT, the technology leader in semiconductor and fiber lasers, announced today the addition of a new 1 kW fiber laser to its next generation fiber laser portfolio.
VANCOUVER, Wash. USA
nLIGHT, the technology leader in semiconductor and fiber lasers, announced today the addition of a new 1 kW fiber laser to its next generation fiber laser portfolio. nLIGHT’s rack-mounted fiber lasers, now available in powers from 500 W to 1 kW, have the fastest repetition rate, shortest rise and fall time, and best beam quality available in a commercial fiber laser.
nLIGHT’s alta fiber lasers are built in the USA with industry-leading, vertically-integrated components. All nLIGHT’s fiber lasers incorporate the industry’s first failsafe back reflection isolation technology for full power processing of highly reflective materials. These features provide end users unprecedented flexibility for process optimization and control, delivering exceptional performance and consistency in the greatest range of cutting and welding applications.
Learn more about nLIGHT alta fiber lasers at the Metalworking and CNC Machine Tool Show in Shanghai, China November 3 – 7, 2015, at the nLIGHT booth in Hall 2H, Booth #A104.
About nLIGHT Corporation
nLIGHT manufactures next generation fiber lasers based on industry-leading diode and fiber technology and vertically integrated global operations. For more information see http://www.nLIGHT.net .
# # #
 //www.prweb.com/releases/2015/10/prweb13031825.htm
